body:
Hi everyone,


Whenever I use ashik2 material I get the following error 
"rpict: system - cannot find function file "0": No such file or 
directory".
Any ideas what can be wrong? I'm using Radiance with Honeybee for 
Grasshopper. I'm getting this error for both image-based simulation and 
annual daylighting calculation.
Thanks
___
